turns.content: Top 20 colleges that most employees in big tech companies in Silicon Valley get an undergraduate degree from

Here are the top 20 colleges that most employees in big tech companies in Silicon Valley get an undergraduate degree from:

1. Stanford University
2. University of California, Berkeley
3. Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
4. California Institute of Technology (Caltech)
5. Carnegie Mellon University
6. University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
7. University of Michigan
8. Georgia Institute of Technology
9. University of Texas at Austin
10. University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA)
11. University of California, San Diego (UCSD)
12. University of Waterloo
13. Purdue University
14. Harvey Mudd College
15. Princeton University
16. Columbia University
17. University of Washington
18. University of Pennsylvania
19. Cornell University
20. University of Southern California (USC)

It is worth noting that there are many other universities that also have a significant number of alumni working in big tech companies in Silicon Valley. The list above is based on a study conducted by the job search website, Hired, which analyzed data from over 400,000 job seekers in the technology industry in the US.
